General.Name: Yunnan Copper Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Copper Co.,Ltd engages in the copper exploration, mining, and smelting activities in China. It offers cathode copper, gold, silver, industrial sulfuric acid, platinum, palladium, selenium, tellurium, rhenium, etc. under the Tiefeng brand. The company engages in the extraction and processing of precious metals and scattered metals; vulcanization and trade; smelting, processing, and sales of non-ferrous metals and precious metal; hydrometallurgy; import and export of goods and technologies, mineral products, metal products, coal, coke, rubber products, and chemical raw materials and products; and sales of plastic products and fuel oil. Yunnan Copper Co.,Ltd was founded in 1958 and is based in Kunming, China.
General.Address: No. 111, Renmin East Road, Kunming, China
